originalText.text: J.Flowers Organizing  organized my move from Michigan to California. She hired movers, packed my 2800 square ft house. She then met movers in California and unpacked and organized entire home. She dealt with moving company with filing a claim for anything that had been damaged by movers. She made the whole experience of moving cross country stress free.  I would recommend her highly, she was very professional and communicated regularly on progress in timely matter.

originalText.text: Ms. Jocellyn Flowers is a joy to work with each week. Her creative ideas have helped me reach many people that I would not reach on my own. Her analytic ability has given me and my team insights into our real customers. She is a class act and exactly what my company has needed! We are so grateful to you! Celeste

originalText.text: Jocelynn did an incredible job designing logos and advertisements for my business. She walked me through each step and offered proofs to review for feedback at each point. She listened well and offered her expert advice. She is kind, thorough, and has a great eye for advertisements! She knew exactly what my business needed for a social media upgrade! Definitely will work with her again.

originalText.text:
J.Flowers Organizing was essential during a very stressful urgent closing of my business - a large dance studio and clothing boutique with tons of inventory and miscellaneous items which needed categorization, packing and shipping to different locations.
Joz is  very professional, personable and comes up with creative solutions.
She is a true gem for anybody who wishes to save time and energy, be it in a personal or business settings.
Thank you, Joz!

originalText.text: Thank you, JFlowers Organizing for the professional logo and web design for my real estate biz. I highly recommend you and your talent to my clients and business partners. I was very  impressed with the design AND also with your professionalism, your promptness and ease of communication.  I look forward to hiring you on future projects!
